body:
### Welcome to MangaR's webpage
MangaR is an application for reading your favorite manga from the internet without even opening a broswer or your local collection. It supports cbr/cbz/sb7 files.
You can choose through a list of 40 mangas!

### Install
Ubuntu/Debian:
```
$ sudo apt-add-repository ppa:christriant/ppa
$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get install mangar
```
Deb file: https://github.com/Clepto/MangaR/downloads

Source code: https://github.com/Clepto/MangaR

### Authors and Contributors
Author: Chris Triantafillis (@Clepto) <christriant1995@gmail.com>
name: MangaR
tagline: MangaR is a program to read manga from the internet or your disk.
